SEARCH
Package com.app.txt.transfer

Interface Transfer<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the data objects to be transferred.
All Known Implementing Classes:
TransferTxt
public interface Transfer<T>
Interface for classes intended to read and write data objects of type T to and from a text file.
Since:
your_project_version
Author:
your_name

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<T>
    read(String filename, LineParser<T> lineParser)
    Read data from a text file and transform it into objects of type T.
    void
    write(String txt, T t, Function<T,String> prepare)
    Write data to a text file.

  • Method Details

    • read

      List<T> read(String filename, LineParser<T> lineParser)
      Read data from a text file and transform it into objects of type T.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to read from
      lineParser - a parser used to transform each line of the file into a data object of type T
      Returns:
      a list of objects of type T

    • write

      void write(String txt, T t, Function<T,String> prepare)
      Write data to a text file. Takes an object of type T and a function to prepare that object for writing.
      Parameters:
      txt - the name of the file to save to
      t - the object to write to the file
      prepare - a function to prepare the object for writing
